mapper.insert: INSERT INTO own_brawler ( player_tag, brawler_id, `rank`, trophies, highest_trophies, power ) SELECT #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brawlerId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trophies, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{highestTrophies, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{power, jdbcType=INTEGER} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT player_tag FROM own_brawler WHERE player_tag = #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND brawler_id = #{brawlerId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT brawler_id FROM own_brawler WHERE player_tag = #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT b.type, FLOOR( COUNT(*) / 2) AS offset_num FROM own_brawler AS o INNER JOIN brawler_master AS b ON o.brawler_id = b.id WHERE player_tag = #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY b.type

SELECT o.highest_trophies AS median FROM own_brawler AS o INNER JOIN brawler_master AS b ON o.brawler_id = b.id WHERE o.player_tag = #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY highest_trophies LIMIT 1 OFFSET #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT o.highest_trophies AS median FROM own_brawler AS o WHERE o.player_tag = #{playerTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY highest_trophies LIMIT 1 OFFSET #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER}
